original_text: As silver is melted in the midst of the furnace, so shall ye be melted in the midst thereof; and ye shall know that I the Lord have poured out my fury upon you.
korean_text: 은이 풀무 불 가운데에서 녹는 것 같이 너희가 그 가운데에서 녹으리니 나 여호와가 분노를 너희 위에 쏟은 줄을 너희가 알리라

sentences.original_text: As silver is melted in the midst of the furnace,
so shall ye be melted in the midst thereof;
sentences.korean_translation: 너희도 그 중앙에서 녹아 없어질 것이며,

sentences.original_text: that I the Lord have poured out my fury upon you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 주님인 내가 너희에게 나의 분노를 쏟아부었음을.
